name: jacksonville
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the US state of Florida: His family moved to Jacksonville when he was nine years old. The office is located in the centre of Jacksonville. And we're told that 15 different neighborhoods here in Jacksonville either were under water or are still under water.
More examplesFewer examples Trinity Baptist Church in Jacksonville has operated a rescue mission for almost 40 years. Duval is the first native of Jacksonville to win a major championship. I spoke with the mayor in Jacksonville just before we went on the air to talk about the dire picture.
